DOC.detailed_description: Parkinson 's disease ( PD ) incurable progressive disease ( Rubenis 2007 ) . Current management include medical , neuro-surgical non-pharmacological intervention . Physiotherapy major component non-pharmacological intervention . Effective intervention include visual auditory cue improve gait ( Nieuwboer et al . 2007 ) , exercise effective improving balance ( Hirsch et al 2003 ) ; intense treadmill train improves motor control , quality life walk speed sustain improvement gait speed motor control post 4 week treatment ( Herman et al 2007 ) . Patient PD attend physiotherapy twice weekly , one half hour 12 week show improvement walk speed Activities Daily Living ( Ellis et al 2005 ) . However , majority focus patient Hoehn Yahr stage 2 3 long term effect lacking ( Kwakkel et al 2007 ) . A knowledge gap present effectiveness physiotherapy training patient Parkinson 's disease advance stage disease long term effect lack . The aim study investigate immediate , short-term & long-term clinical effect physiotherapy train patient Parkinson 's disease . The hypothesis compare patient education alone , physiotherapy intervention patient Parkinson 's disease lead improve function quality life .
